document.full_text: rebels cheered the defection of a libyan minister as a sign that muammar gaddafi's rule was crumbling, but u.s. officials warned he was far from beaten and made clear they feared entanglement in another painful war.
document.title: rebels cheer cracks in gaddafi regime
lines_and_colors: rebels cheered the defection of a libyan minister as a sign that muammar gaddafi's rule was crumbling, but u.s. officials warned he was far from beaten and made clear they feared entanglement in another painful war.
